about.description: Scooby has HTML formatting for Jupyter notebooks and rich text formatting for just about every other environment. We designed this module to be lightweight such that it could easily be added as a dependency to Python projects for environment reporting when debugging. Simply add scooby to your dependencies and implement a function to have scooby report on the aspects of the environment you care most about.
about.summary: A lightweight toolset to easily report your Python environment's package versions and hardware resources.

name: scooby
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "scooby" %}
{% set version = "0.4.3" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 44b9ae2ceeb4dfe2a375d27259609c8dce39cb3f9fbd6d02bd7fec69f1701a82

build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
  run:
    - python

test:
  imports:
    - scooby

about:
  home: https://github.com/banesullivan/scooby/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: "A lightweight toolset to easily report your Python environment's package versions and hardware resources."
  description: |
    Scooby has HTML formatting for Jupyter notebooks and rich text formatting for just about every other environment. We designed this module to be lightweight such that it could easily be added as a dependency to Python projects for environment reporting when debugging. Simply add scooby to your dependencies and implement a function to have scooby report on the aspects of the environment you care most about.
  doc_url: https://github.com/banesullivan/scooby/blob/master/README.md
  dev_url: https://github.com/banesullivan/scooby

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - banesullivan
    - prisae
